login.useYourCDLogin: Please use your campus dual credentials

errorMessages.acceptingPrivacyPolicyRequired: You need to accept the privacy policy!
errorMessages.usernamePasswordNotMatching: The combination of username and password does not match!

deleteUserDialog.title: Credentials required
deleteUserDialog.contentText: Your credentials are required to delete your user data. No data will be deleted on the servers of the campus dual system, only on the servers of the Plan4BA App.

pollLecturesDialog.title: Credentials required
pollLecturesDialog.contentText: Credentials are required to fetch the schedule from the campus dual system. You can activate the option 'Store credentials' to refresh your schedule automatically without entering your credentials every time.

changeStoreCredentials.title: Credentials required
changeStoreCredentials.contentText: Credentials are required to change this setting.

pollingService.startPollingLectures: We're currently fetching your schedule from the campus dual system. This may take a minute.

notifications.lectureChanged: There's a change in the schedule!
